resources.string: Could not load the city, the file seems to be damaged.\n\nSorry.
The picture has been saved as %1$s.
Do you really want to delete? This cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to leave TheoTown?
Cannot use an empty name for your city.
This size is experimental and may not work on your device. Do you really want to create a huge map?
Every little town needs a church.
Every big city needs an appropriate city hall. Strategic decisions are made here.
Wires transport energy from your power plants to your city.
A wind turbine generates electricity from the wind. It does not pollute the environment, but it creates noise.
A coal plant generates electricity by burning coal. It generates considerable amounts of pollution, so keep it away from residential zones.
Solar panels generate electricity from the sun, although they are not very powerful.
A small park that fits just about anywhere. Inhabitants like living and working near green spaces and plazas.
A small park that fits just about anywhere. Inhabitants like living and working near green spaces and plazas.
A small park that fits just about anywhere. Inhabitants like living and working near green spaces and plazas.
A small, yet fancy water feature. Inhabitants like living and working near pretty structures.
A large park for events and gatherings. Inhabitants like living and working near green spaces and plazas.
A clinic will help your inhabitants with the most basic ailments and emergencies.
A large hospital can handle lots of patients and tackle emergencies quickly.
A place where young children learn.\nEducation allows richer people to move in to your city.
A place where older children learn.\nEducation allows richer people to move in to your city.
A place to explore art, science, and culture. Provides ample education of both levels.
Pipes can be used to transport water to your buildings.
Provides lots of water for your buildings. Does not need any water nearby!
Provides small amounts of water for buildings.
Responds to emergencies and prevents crime in the area.
Prevents fires in its radius. Has two fire engines that can extinguish fires.
A statue honoring the founder of the city. Inhabitants like living and working near pretty structures.
A very accurate replica of the Gillender Building. Thanks for 250,000 downloads!
A place where young children learn. Can house lots of students.\nEducation allows richer people to move in to your city.
A quiet green space for walking and relaxing in. Inhabitants like living and working near green spaces and plazas.
No animals were harmed in production!
You may try to tap on the right bottom corner
There\'s a donate button on the homepage
Inspired by European grandeur, this classy palace makes for an excellent tourist attraction.\n\nInhabitants like living and working near pretty structures.
Congratulations, your city exceeds a size of %1$,d inhabitants!
A small, yet fancy water feature. Inhabitants like living and working near pretty structures.
A quiet green space for walking and relaxing in. Inhabitants like living and working near green spaces and plazas.
Could not create save directory for %1$s. Please check app permissions.
Responds to emergencies and prevents crime in the area. Crime makes the city less attractive.
Residents will build houses in this zone.
Commercial buildings can build in this zone.
Industrial buildings will be built here.
A simple and affordable unpaved road. Minimal upkeep and speed.
A standard and reliable city road.
Place some trees on your territory.
Connect neighborhoods to the bus network. Public transport makes inhabitants happier and reduces car dependency.
Dispatches and maintains city busses. Bus routes will not function without it.
You can remove almost anything with this tool. Use the zone removal tool to remove zones.
This tool can be used to remove water pipes.
A large football field for games and fun.\n\nWealthy residents appreciate good sport facilities.
A massive venue for major games, concerts and other events.\n\nWealthy residents appreciate good sport facilities.
Install additional illumination for late-night events.
Everyone enjoys a good splash.\n\nWealthy residents appreciate good sport facilities.
Install some extra equipment for even more splash.
A spacious park with some greenery. It can be upgraded with a centerpiece.\n\nInhabitants like living and working near green spaces and plazas.
A place to play basketball. Every neighborhood needs one!\n\nWealthy residents appreciate good sport facilities.
A place to play tennis.\n\nWealthy residents appreciate good sports facilities.
Install a gazebo for evening parties, or as a respite from the midday sun.
Install a large ornamental clock tower to help your inhabitants stay on time.
The power plants are almost overloaded. Consider building new ones.
The city is running out of water. Consider building new water pumps or towers.
Our faith is the city\'s foundation. Will you help build more places to gather?
This place is pretty drab. Can we get a park around here?
There\'s nowhere to do sports. That\'s a bummer.
Install a roof so that games can be played in any weather.
Accessories, snacks and souvenirs are sold here.
Congrats, you unlocked the upgrade %1$s for building %2$s!
Fire! Dispatch fire engines before the city burns down! Consider building more fire departments.
There\'s too much pollution around here!
Broadcasts music, news and talks across the city. The inhabitants will appreciate the entertainment.
Dispatch the police to stop criminals and protests.
Dispatch the fire brigade if something is burning.
Dispatch ambulances to help with medical emergencies.
All this noise is driving me insane!
A place of worship. Nearby areas will be more welcoming to the religious.
A place of worship. Nearby areas will be more welcoming to the religious.
Sends the newest news about the city. Slightly improves education.\n\nOnly one radio program is allowed at the same time. Old programs will be removed.

Sends sports reports and exciting live broadcasts of sporting events. Acts like a sports facility with very long range.\n\nOnly one radio program is allowed at the same time. Old programs will be removed.
Sends mostly music and a light entertainment programs. Acts like a park with very long range.\n\nOnly one radio program is allowed at the same time. Old programs will be removed.

Sends conversations on the subject of faith, origin, and spirituality. Acts as a house of worship with a very long range.\n\nOnly one radio program is allowed at the same time. Old programs will be removed.
The blinding beam of light used to guide ships in the past. It\'s mostly a decorative structure nowadays.
High-speed traffic is permitted on this road. Perfect for quick transport in urban environments.
You can always show and hide the minimap.
We will start by building some roads. Select the simplest, cheapest road type - the dirt road.
Place the road along the marked tiles. To build it, tap to set a start point, then tap again to set the end point.
Great work! Now, close the road tool.
Let\'s try to build some solar panels - they should be enough for a small village.
Place it on the marked tiles.
You can use wires to transport energy.
Place them along the marked tiles.
Let\'s try to build a water tower now to provide our inhabitants with running water.
Place it on the marked tile.
A water tower alone isn\'t enough, though. You need pipes in order to transport water.
Place the pipes along the marked tiles.
Now you can start with declaring zones.
Zones describe who can build where. There are three types of them.
Let\'s declare a residential zone. Inhabitants can build their houses there.
Place the zone on the marked tiles.
Let\'s continue with a commercial zone. Stores, offices and entertainment venues will build there.
Place the zone on the marked tiles.
Last but not least, industrial zones. That\'s where factories and warehouses will be built.
Place the zone on the marked tiles.
Great work. Now buildings will be built.
You should keep industrial zones away from other ones because of the pollution and noise they produce.
Tap on this button to see detailed demand information for every zone type. Positive demand means that people want to move in.
You can accelerate or slow down simulation speed to shorten waiting time or pause the game.
Set it back to normal speed for now.
Your task is it to gain money from taxes to enlarge your city.
Tap in the bottom right corner to get more information about your money or to change taxes.
Congratulations, you learned the basics of TheoTown. Now you can start your own city :)
Cars can drive in only one direction on this road. Use it to control traffic.
There\'s a fire in your city! Build fire departments to extinguish the fire.
It\'s a destroyed structure. You should remove it.
Set a target structure on fire.
Force the ground to shake uncontrollably.
Please, give me a penny, I need it so much :(
A huge crater left behind after a meteorite impact. It should probably be flattened.
A small crater left behind after a meteorite impact. It should probably be flattened.
Detonate an extremely powerful explosive charge that leaves the affected irradiated.
You may support us by tapping on ads :)
Summon a large tornado that will wreak havoc and destroy everything in its unpredictable path.
A residential zone with higher density.\nDense zones can house more people in the same space, mostly by building tall.
A commercial zone with high density.\nDense zones can house more people in the same space, mostly by building tall.
Industrial zone with high density.\nDense zones can house more people in the same space, mostly by building tall.
A cheap zone for farm buildings. Minimum size for farms is 4x4.\nFarms only satisfy Industrial ₮ demand.
Can only be built one time
A small-town place of worship. Inhabitants will congregate here to fulfil their religion needs.
A small-town place of worship. Inhabitants will congregate here to fulfil their religion needs.
Culture improves the quality of life and satisfaction of your inhabitants. Landmarks, monuments and museums all increase cultural presence in your city.
Low education is provided by elementary schools. Mid-class residents will only move in if there are elementary schools available.
High education is provided by high schools. Wealthy residents will only move in if there are both primary and high schools available.
Fire departments prevent fires from occurring in their influence radius.
Doctors help keep your inhabitants healthy.
Nobody would want to live in a noisy neighborhood.
Inhabitants are much happier with green spaces and pretty things nearby.
Police increases security and prevents crime. Crime can greatly reduce happiness.
Nobody would want to live in a dirty neighborhood.
Lots of inhabitants have religious and spiritual needs that have to be addressed.
Appropriate sport facilities keep your inhabitants fit, healthy and happy, and make your city more attractive to the wealthiest inhabitants.
Industrial zone that has to be placed by the water. Cargo ships will be loaded and unloaded here.\n\Harbors only satisfy Industrial ₮ demand.
Shows building density. Dense buildings house more people in the same space.
Shows buildings that may not be removed.
A nice house for the mayor.
The heart of city administration. Critical management decisions are made here.
A town square for your town hall.\nInhabitants like living and working near pretty structures.
Provides some water for your buildings. Needs to be placed near water!
Releases raw sewage all around, polluting the nearby area. A quick and dirty solution for any water treatment problems.
The wealthy love to spend their free time here. Inhabitants can rent small sailboats here.
Cities will be saved in internal storage. You will have no access to them.
Some decorations for your residential areas.
Some decorations for your commercial areas.
Some decorations for your industrial areas.
Much more powerful than any other power plant. Harnessing nuclear energy is very expensive and potentially dangerous - make sure to provide enough clean water at all times.
Burning gas is relatively cheap and efficient. It\'s also cleaner than other fossil fuels.
There\'s no money left. I\'m afraid you might have to take out some loans soon.
Great risk for people and nature. Do not build nearby!
Elevated railway tracks. Trains will run above the streets, saving space and moving people efficiently.
Railways are a great method to reduce traffic on your roads. Build stations in different areas of your city and connect them using railways.
A place where young children learn. It\'s not big enough for anything larger than a small village.\nEducation allows richer people to move in to your city.
This tool can be used to remove zones.
Prevents fires in its small radius. Has just a single fire engine that can extinguish fires.
Responds to emergencies and prevents crime in a small area around it.
Starts a riot which can only be stopped by police S.W.A.T. teams.
Sunny and relaxing. Popular with local residents and tourists alike.
A nice place to rest and grab a refreshing drink.
People want to live in our town. Declare a residential zone for them to build their houses in.
Build a commercial zone - the city needs stores and offices.
Factories and warehouses can also be built in our city, but you have to declare zones for them first.
This facility houses specialized forces for deterring serious crime. Can be deployed to quell rioting inhabitants before they cause too much damage to the city.
Some buildings are disconnected from the road network. You should consider building more roads.
Our current waste management infrastructure is unable to deal with so much sewage!
A well managed city is an efficient city.
TheoTown has developed a lot since this city has been created. It might therefore not work as expected.
People are complaining about poor healthcare. You should build a clinic or a hospital.
Enter a new name for your city here.
Enter a new name for this building.
Sorry, your device has insufficient RAM to run TheoTown.
Do you want to save your progress before closing?
Enter a name for the copy.
Waves of crime have been reported recently. Residents will get increasingly concerned if you don\'t address this issue.
Maybe we should improve traffic by building a main road. Select the country road.
Tap on the start and the end point of the planned road. See how a bridge will be built automaticially over the river.
Sunny and relaxing. Popular with local residents and tourists alike.
Dispatch specialized police forces to quell riots.
The city is in turmoil because of %1$s! Deploy law enforcement to restore order before the violent crowd spreads!
The city is in turmoil! Deploy law enforcement to restore order before the violent crowd spreads!
The inhabitants are protesting because of %1s! Call the police or resolve the issue before it spirals out of control!
A nice road with a tree median. It can handle more traffic than a single road.
The perfect road to connect distant areas. It\'s expensive, but cars can reach very high speeds on it.
People here are unhappy because of %1$s. You should try to improve the resolve the issue.
A bit of nature and shade for busy city centers.
And the rest of our community
Convert city into sandbox mode?\n\nThis cannot be undone!
Congratulations, your city %1$s reached a new rank:
Install a helipad from where helicopters may start and land.\nIncreases the range of the fire department.
Are you sure you want to reset all settings to their default values?\n\nThis cannot be undone.
Removes the ads at the bottom of the screen.
An unidentified flying object attacks your city!
We have a new currency: Theons ₮
Work in progress. Do not cross the line.
I will build my own city with skyscrapers and parks
May the Force be with you
A bigger high school for more students.\nEducation allows richer people to move in to your city.
A large starting grant from the state, increased tax income, cheaper buildings. This game mode is perfect for someone who\'s just starting out or looking for a casual game.
The default game mode. You start with a satisfactory sum of money and it shouldn\'t be too difficult to build the city of your dreams.
A tight budget, lower tax incomes, and rampant inflation. This game mode is perfect for experienced mayors and those looking for a challenge.
We have to improve %1$s happiness so %2$s can move into our city.
You can unlock this rank immediately, if you want to.

This bundle contains an assortment of small residential, commercial, and industrial buildings. Use them to create more diverse neighborhoods, fill in gaps, or give your districts a fresh new look. Great for growing cities that need more life and variety.
It looks as if these diamonds are yours now.
Do you want to connect this road to the neighboring city?
Do you want to unlock this area to create a new city here?
At least %1$,d inhabitants in the region needed.
Highway built and paid by the state.
Country road built and paid by the state.
Do you want to reset this city to its original state?\n\nThis cannot be undone.
One-way road built and paid by the state.
Your city is just part of something bigger. Here you can see all of your cities.

In TheoTown we discriminate building demand for different building types and different levels. Building types are residential, commercial and industrial. There are three levels, poor (₮), medium (₮₮) and rich (₮₮₮).
Welcome to your first town.\n\nTry to get 300 inhabitants.
Congratulations your city reached a new rank.\n\nEach rank unlocks some buildings and you get a reward.
Cannot unlock more than %1$,d maps at once.
Do you want to unlock this map immediately?
Wait while this map is being unlocked...
Enter here a new name for the region:
A grand center of city administration, standing tall as a symbol of progress. Thank you for 1M downloads!
This water pump stands in polluted area. Move it somewhere else to keep the water clean.
All this garbage is rather unsightly. You should get rid of it quickly.
Our children need a place to study. The residents demand a new elementary school.
We should consider building a high school - most cities of this size do.
Allows you to use faster game speed for %1$s.
There\'s a lot of cars on this road. You should try increasing its throughput; either by building more roads or upgrading to better ones.
This school at capacity. Improve its performance or build more of them.
We don\'t have enough money to buy this right now.\n\nDo you want to get the missing %1$s immediately?
This hospital is at capacity. We have to build another one to tend to all patients.
Hey, if you enjoy our game, please rate it. That would help us a lot!
Alternatively, if you have ideas please don\'t hesitate to let us know.
Would you like to skip %1$,d days?
Some decorations that imitate a construction site.
Decorations and props for your military base.

This bundle allows you to build a formidable military base with barracks, tank depots and rocket launchers. Earn extra funds by conducting potentially dangerous rocket tests. Protect the city from unexpected visitors before they cause too much damage.
Science! We found a solution to improve game resolution. Would you like to use it?\n\nThis can be changed in the settings any time.
Military buildings can only be placed within this zone.
A road dedicated to military vehicles and emergency cars. Regular roads can\'t be built in the military zone.
The headquarters is the most important building of your military base.
Stores vehicles, weaponry and military supplies alike.
Houses and maintains heavy military vehicles.
Can be used to shoot UFOs. Try not to destroy any city buildings.
The government would like to do some rocket testing in your city. As this may lead to disasters you get a compensation for the risk.
This small, yet anomalous landform is a tourist attraction in this relatively flat land.
This bundle contains a small mountain that serves as an interesting landmark and a tourist attraction for your city.
Do you want to establish a connection to the outside?
Oops...I\'m afraid our last rocket test issued a galactic disaster.
Mayor, we need you to spend all the money!

This bundle contains a range of large residential, commercial, and industrial buildings. Elevate the living standards of your inhabitants, construct unique and diverse skyscraper districts and benefit from massive industrial complexes.
Enter a name for this area.
Enter a new text for your label or delete it at all.
Create, edit and remove labels with this tool.
This bundle contains a set of plaza decorations. Spruce up your city with modern lamps and bushes. Create stylish commercial districts with inviting plazas, fountains and statues.
This bundle permanently unlocks the slow game speed setting. For when life\'s too fast, but you don\'t quite want to put it on pause yet.
Irritating, but pretty. It\'s a great addition for beaches and seaside resorts.
Some rocks protruding out the water.

This bundle contains the main fire station building. Gain access to a large fire station equipped with a fleet of emergency vehicles. Prevent emergencies in a wide area. Install a helipad to fight fires from above and reach places inaccessible to fire engines.
Permanently unlock a go-kart race track and enable go-kart traffic in your city. This feature introduces a motor sports attraction and adds visual variety as go-karts may appear on nearby roads.
Has huge radius and many cars. Useful to prevent or extinguish fires.
What about some motor sports in your town? Will also spawn go-carts on normal road.
What a lovely place, isn\'t it?
However, let\'s build a big city, but maybe we should start slowly.
Tap on the screen to move the map. You can zoom with two fingers.
Great, I think you have some feeling for the controls now. So we can start with your first city.
How convenient, the nation has already built some roads here, so we can use them for free.
Let\'s start! Declare a residential area.
Here we also have to wait for the building to complete. Instead of waiting we might buy it for diamonds.
Let\'s have a look into the demand overview.
Here you can see demand for res (residential), com (commercial) and ind (industrial) buildings.
There are three levels of wealth: ₮, ₮₮ and ₮₮₮ which correspond to poor, medium and rich.
On average you need as much commercial and industrial zones as you have residential ones.
You may have noticed that it\'s easy to lose clear view in your city. Therefore I would like to present you: The Minimap
Great. Let\'s have a look into other magic stuff.
Here you can see general information about your city. You can rename it by tapping on it\'s current name.
Another useful tool is this one.
It shows you details about the happiness of your inhabitants.
Wouldn\'t it be cool to be the master of time? Try to make anything faster.
And now go back to normal speed...
I\'m sorry to interrupt you, but there\'s also non magical stuff. Money for example.
Here I give you a short overview about our money. We can earn money by taxes, so it\'s in our interest to get more inhabitants.
In some cases we might have to take a loan... let\'s hope that this won\'t happen.
Lets build some parks. People like that.
Good work, so far. Now I want to present you the rank indicator. It shows you the current rank of your city.
Gain inhabitants and solve disasters to reach the next rank. This way you can unlock more buildings.
About disasters, they will happen... You can access action forces via this tab, when available.
To make things visible you can use this tab.
I told you most of the things I know. But one important thing left: There are presents
You can get a present each day.
You can join our community on theotown.com or in Discord (see game menu for that).

Temporarily unlock faster game speed to accelerate construction, city growth, and simulation progress. This option provides limited access to advanced time controls, allowing you to move through longer development phases more efficiently.

Gain extended access to higher game speed, enabling faster progression through complex city development stages. Ideal for managing large projects, testing layouts, or advancing scenarios with greater efficiency.

Unlock maximum access to fast game speed for extended periods. Intended for experienced mayors who want full control over simulation pacing, this option allows rapid progression while maintaining complete oversight of your city.

Unlock controlled access to weather conditions by building the Weather Machine in your city. This building allows you to trigger specific weather events such as rain, thunderstorms, fog or clear skies.
Uses some top secret technology! You can use it to control weather.
A military fence for decoration purposes.
Build your own city in this city simulation game.

Do you want to build your own city? In TheoTown you can watch your own city growing. Declare zones for residential, commercial or industrial buildings and build road to connect them. Make your city more attractive by building parks, schools and many more facilities.
If you provide TheoTown access to external storage, it will save cities in the directory TheoTown/maps on your device so you have access to them.
A huge fog machine that can generate fog for the whole city.
Unlock the Forester\'s Lodge, a building that replants trees across your city. It\'s up to you to decide which trees to plant.
Sometimes trees have to be replanted if the environment is too polluted. This house replants trees automatically.
Inhabitants feel safe near bunkers. At least they\'re fireproof.
Build your airport within this airfield zone.
Just some letters to give %1$s a personal touch.
Unlock a set of decorative letters that can be freely placed throughout your city. Use them to create custom signs, or add subtle visual details to specific areas of your city.
You may have to restart the app to properly change the language.
A wonderful fountain that will delight the inhabitants of %1$s and you, too.
Permanently unlock a large fountain park to place it in your city. This park serves as a visual centerpiece and enhances the appearance of surrounding areas.
Big wires for a lot of energy. For regional energy exchange.
A transformer is needed to transform between high and normal voltage. Build it near a transmission line.
Come to the light side, we have icecream
Every pixel is made by hand
May contain traces of hard work
Allow gameplay upload without Wifi connection (may be expensive!)
Enter a new name for your airplane:
A long range airplane from TheoAir.
A golden variant of the long range airplane from TheoAir.
Make your airport more realistic with these decorations.
You have to build a tower in order to control your airport
You have to ensure that your tower is working
Add a new lane for your airport
Only one lane at a time can be added
Enter a new name for your lane:
Enter your redeem code here to redeem it:
The entered redeem code is either invalid or was already used. Please check for typing errors.
An airport needs at least one tower to work properly.
An airport needs an entry so people can come into it.
Gates are needed for incoming/outgoing passengers.
A runway where planes can start and land. Minimum length is 12.
A double-deck, long range airplane from TheoAir. It has a lot of space.
Do you want to unlock this lane immediately?\n%1$s left.
Please help us and rate TheoTown
With the Starter Package you\'ll receive: (buildings for permanent usage)
Login to allow us to synchronize your profile.
Use this road to connect your gates with your runways.
Just a present. Try to tap on it.
Ever-expanding slime that will slowly consume not everything in sight.
Ever-expanding slime that will slowly consume everything in sight.
A hydroelectric Power Plant that can be used to create electricity using the power of rivers. Does not generate pollution.
Permanently unlock the Slime Disaster. This slimy disaster can threaten buildings and infrastructure, allowing you to test your city’s resilience and emergency response under unusual conditions.
The Christmas tree will fill the hearts of your inhabitants with joy and glory. Do you see any presents?
The Jardine House is a office tower placed in Hong Kong. It has 52 floors and has a height of 179 m. It was completed in 1972.
The Bank of China Tower in Hong Kong houses the headquarters for the Bank of China HK. It has 70 floors, is 367 m high and was finished in 1990.
Children like to build snowmen in winter time.
The International Commerce Centre in Hong Kong is a 108 story, commercial skyscraper. It\'s the tallest building in Hong Kong with a height of 484 m. It was completed in 2010.
A firework with the shape of a torch.
This firework mimics the shape of a jellyfish.
A switch to initiate fireworks. Connect it to wires.

Unleash a burst of creativity with our Fireworks Frenzy Pack! Place and compose your very own spectacular fireworks displays. Light up the sky, dazzle your citizens, and make every celebration unforgettable. Upgrade now and let your imagination take flight in a colorful explosion of joy!
A switch that will automatically emit a signal on new year.
A fast long range airplane from TheoAir.
A red and yellow explosion combined with white fade.
A red explosion with a yellow fade out.
A red explosion with a cool light effect.
A beautiful explosion with mixed colors and a fade out.
Three white explosions combined with a red fade out.
Big rockets shot into the air.
Your first very own helicopter. Unfortunately, it won\'t listen to you.
Something stucking in the ground. You better remove it.
A radioactive destroyed structure. You better remove it.
TheoTown needs access to external storage to save your progress.
Rock is falling from the sky!
We have a nuclear explosion right here!
By enabling gameplay upload you allow us to upload your gameplay to our servers. See the disclaimer for more information.
Would you like to unlock this bus immediately?
Do you want to place this building here?
The Brandenburg Gate is a German landmark that was built in the 18th century. It\'s located in Berlin.
You dismissed multiple tasks, so would you like to disable them for this city?
The Arc de Triomphe in Paris honours those who fought and died in the French Revolution.
Temporarily reduce the construction time of all buildings. This effect allows faster expansion and quicker completion of large projects for a limited duration.
Watch a short video to temporarily reduce construction time for %s.
The Eiffel Tower in Paris is the most prominent landmark of France. The tower is 324 metres tall and was finished in 1889.
Would you like to collect what %1$s earned while you were absent?\n\n%2$s
Want to save some diamonds? This boost reduces tunnel price by 50%% for %s.
Indicator for happiness about education availability.
Happiness about level of neighboring buildings.
Happiness about available energy and water.
Happiness about facilities for free time.
If people use busses there will be less traffic.
If people use trains there will be less traffic on the road.
People prefer to live in a residential area.
Commercials are often grouped together to attract customers.
Industries produce and manufacture products, goods, materials, and resources to be sold at commercial buildings. People don\'t want to live nearby.
Buildings of this level are usually poor.
Buildings of this level are not that poor.
Buildings of this level are usually rich.
High buildings are typically more dense.
Parks and especially forests have a great nature influence.
Waste should be removed in order to make your inhabitants happy.
A simple road on which only buses can drive on.
A one-way road only buses can drive on.
Want to get some diamonds for free by watching an ad?
Big Ben is a bell tower in London that is 96 m high and was built 1859.
The Angel of Independence is a monument in Mexico City that was built in 1910 to remember Mexico\'s War of Independence.
The Statue of Liberty was a gift from the French to the Americans. It was inaugurated in 1886 and is 93 meters high.
An old and rusty water tower. It does absolutely nothing.
Work like normal wires, but are placed underground so nobody has to see them.
Contains the following buildings for permanent usage:
A place for retired aircraft. It\'s dirty but produces some income.
Hey mayor, did you forget about your mission to build a great city?
There\'s not much free space left on your device (%,d MB).\n\nCities might not be saved due to insufficient space!
The Sydney Opera House is a multi-venue performing arts centre that is located in Sydney, Australia. It was completed in 1973 and has a height of 65 meters.
The One Raffles Place is a skyscraper in the city of Singapore that was built in 1986 and has a height of 280 meters.
The Willis Tower (also known as Sears Tower) is a skyscraper that is located in Chicago, United States. The tower was built in 1973 and is 442 meters high.
Contains the following buildings for permanent usage:
Want to build a specific road or building again? Use this tool and tap on it. Not supported by all structures.
Select a building in order to move it to a new place. Not all buildings can be moved.
Are you sure that you want to delete this screenshot? This cannot be undone!
Do you want to upload your screenshot to our gallery?\n\nBy pressing \"Upload now\", you agree that you accept our policy.
The Leaning Tower of Pisa is a bell tower located in the Italian City of Pisa that was completed in 1372 and its height amounts to 56 meters.
The Burj Al Arab is a luxury hotel that is located in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. It was completed in 1999 and has a height of 321 meters.
The Hearst Tower is an office building in New York City that was built in 2006. It has a height of 182 meters.
Why burn the garbage or bring it to the landfill if it can be recycled in the buyback center?
A wild pickle appeared in %s. What will you do about it, mayor?
A rugby field for rugby fans.
Just an Easter egg. What will you do about it?
There\'s an Easter egg somewhere. Can you find it?
Congratulations, you found the Easter egg :)
You selected %d diamond priced buildings for removal. Are you sure that you want to remove them? There\'s a move building tool if you just want to move them.
The Oriental Pearl Tower is a TV tower in Shanghai whose construction was completed in 1994. The height of the tower amounts to 470 meters.
The Shanghai World Financial Center is a skyscraper that is located in Shanghai and was completed 2008. It\'s height is 494 meters.
A traditional pagoda with Sakura trees. What a lovely place.
The Saint Basil\'s Cathedral is a church in Moscow, Russia. It was completed in 1561 and is a museum now. It\'s height amounts to 115 meters.
Tō-ji is a Buddhist temple in Kyoto, Japan. It was completed in 796 and it has a height of 55 meters.
Garbage is not collected for this building.
This landfill is full! Tap on it to clear it!
A lot of space to collect all the garbage. Can only be removed if empty.
SWIPE on the garbage to clear it.
We can clear the landfill for you.
Quick and dirty way to get rid of all the garbage.
Call the garbage truck to collect garbage from the road.
Use this tool to remove road decoration overlays.
They are essential for any oasis.
No water? No problem for these cacti.
A guard that watches over the Ancient Bear.
A statue of the Ancient Bear.
Reduces the emitted pollution and noise drastically.
The Taipei Financial Center in Taipei is a supertall skyscraper in Taiwan. It has a height of 510 meters and has been the tallest building in the world until 2010. It was finished in 2004.
Just some decorative stones lying near your road.
Which noise? I don\'t hear any.
You can see cars through it.
There are street lights for the night.
Temporarily double your city’s income. This effect provides additional funds for a limited time, helping you finance construction, services, and expansion.
It\'s dangerous to just cross the road.
It\'s a fence but it\'s also white.
In the jungle, the mighty jungle, the lion sleeps tonight.
Surprisingly enough, it\'s not that cold in an igloo.
Hi, we\'re updating our Privacy Policy. Please take time to review it.
A metro tunnel. You cannot see it and yet it is there.
Elevated railway for urban areas for faster speed.
A compact railway station for places with little space.
Although they are technically cherry trees they don\'t grow cherries.
You\'ve probably seen this building before. The Chrysler Building in New York is famous for it\'s iconic look. Completed in 1930 the building has a height of 319m.
The Giza pyramid complex is the oldest of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World and well known around the world. The Great Pyramid is the largest of the three pyramids and has a height of 139m.
Tap on it to close it. A great way to create traffic jams.
Upload failed, due to an technical issue on our servers, or your internet connection is unstable or unavailable.
The small hospital offers more space for more patients.
A beautiful church and convent for your city.
A backhoe in the middle of the road doesn\'t sound like a good idea, does it?

Congratulations, %d buildings have been completed since your last visit.
Can be used to barricade the road.
Mayor, you can be proud of yourself!
A station to access the metro. For trains you have to build a metro station.
Allows people to safely cross the street.
Safer than a crosswalk or traffic island.
An old windmill for your city\'s countryside.
A simple form of public transport.
A giant mutated god of all pickles.
A bit too big grown vegetable. It may spawn civilized pickles that use roads.

Pay some people to fake some protesters.

A tiny roundabout. Place it at your intersections.
Don\'t want to deal with money? In this game mode there\'s no money nor are there population requirements.
You selected free game mode.\n Pros: No money, no requirements, options to control demand\n Cons: Less challenges
A modern hospital that can care for more patients in a smaller space.
Create a game of life field. Tap on built tiles to switch their state. Default state is dead.
Coit Memorial Tower was built in 1933 and was dedicated to the volunteer firemen who had died in San Francisco\'s five major fires.
Bank of America Center, is a 52-story 779 ft (237 m) skyscraper in San Francisco, California.
The Transamerica Pyramid is a 260m skyscraper in San Francisco that was completed in 1972 and is the home of financial services companies.
Get some famous buildings from San Francisco, CA.
I think we can reuse some of the space here.
SWIPE to free up some space.
A place where the remains of dead people are buried.
Dear mayor, I urge you to build a cemetery to bury the deceased.
There\'s no space left in this cemetery. Clean it up or build a new cemetery or crematory.
Halloween is coming! Everyone loves pumpkins, right?
A spooky dead tree that is typically used in ghost stories.

There\'s an epidemic outbreak, we have to take action immediately. Send the ambulance!
There\'s an epidemic outbreak and we have no doctor, clinic, or hospital. Get one NOW!
Congratulations, you\'re running in huge texture mode.
Withering leaves can be so beautiful.
\"Mum, what is that?\"\n\"Don\'t look at it. Otherwise it will haunt you in your dreams.\"
Put some money into it and you\'ll be able to solve any issues with crime.
A city hall inspired by the city hall in San Francisco.
The Palace of Fine Arts of San Francisco, California, is a monumental structure originally constructed for the 1915 Panama-Pacific Exposition.

Gift from Santa rewards you with few diamonds.

Welcome to the Plugin Store! Here you can get hundreds of additional contents for TheoTown made by players around the world.\n \n We recommend to read the plugin descriptions carefully to understand what a plugin does before you download it.
You can connect your game to one or multiple accounts.\n \n By connecting the game to a TheoTown Forum account you can participate in comment sections.
The demand describes the need for specific buildings. It is divided into residential, commercial and industrial demands. For each of them there are three different levels of wealth.
Some burnt down trees that you might want to remove.
Congratulations, this is a free spot that you can acquire to build your own city here.
Are you sure that you want to delete this region? This cannot be undone.
Are you sure that you want to reset this region? This cannot be undone.
Do you want to generate that region now?
In order to upload a region you have to connect TheoTown with a TheoTown account.
This will copy this region to the public list of online regions.\n\nOnce the region is uploaded you can claim parts on it online. If no password is set other players can join there then, too.
Here you can enter a password to access the region. Leave this field empty to set no password.

For balancing reasons we introduced a currency called Region Coins. You will earn them for free on a daily basis just by opening the game.\n\nThis currency allows us to offer you our online services for free.
Ensure that you have a stable internet connection before starting the process.
As of right now, you can only upload regions that have unfounded cities in them.
In order to acquire a plot in a online region you have to connect TheoTown with a TheoTown account.
This plot is free so you can acquire it.
This is your plot. You can found a city here.
Wait some time before you acquire another city in that region.

Unfortunately your city could not be saved.

Please try again.

Welcome to online mode! Here you can play together with your friends to work on regions together! You can even upload your own custom regions to play with your friends.\n\n"It\'s pretty cool!" - our Discord administrator said.
You are using an outdated version that is not compatible with this feature anymore.\n\nPlease update your game.
There are no specific rules for this region.
Here you can define some rules the players of this region have to follow:

Are you sure that you want to transfer the ownership over your region %1$s to %2$s?\n\nYou cannot undo that.
Are you sure that you want to remove %1$s from this plot?\n\nThis cannot be undone.
Here you can set a new password. Leave it blank to reuse the current one.
Awesome! You are about to send that gift to %1$s.
Be the first one to send a gift
Here you can enter a message for the receiver if you want to
Are you sure that you want to delete this gift? This cannot be undone.
If you think this is a reporting issue please ensure that the app has actually access to external storage.
This region is way too big to be uploaded :/
New information about your cities in online mode.

TheoTown uses the external storage permission in order to save cities and regions in an user accessible way. By doing so we can circumvent potential data loss caused by app updates or re-installation. \n\nThe game should be able to run without that permission. However, we don\'t take any responsibility for potential data loss or broken functionality caused by using the internal storage.
In order to proceed you have to specify a reason for this action.

We will now start with the tutorial to teach you the basics about how to build up your city.\n\n You can skip the tutorial if you already know how to play. You can skip the tutorial at any time in the game menu.

Currently assigned: %1$s
 Default: %2$s

 Press a key to assign it to this action.
The app has no access to external storage to store the region in a safe way. Please grant access to external storage in order to generate regions.

Coverage with energy. Energy is transported using wires.
The coverage with water. Water is transported to your residents using pipes.
Are you sure that you want to delete %1$s? This cannot be undone!
Welcome to the TheoTown file manager. Here you can access and manage your maps, regions, plugins and so on.
Enter a name for the folder:

The Hassan II Mosque is a mosque in Casablanca, Morocco. It is the second largest functioning mosque in Africa and is the 7th largest in the world. Its minaret is the world\'s second tallest minaret at 210 metres (689 ft).Completed in 1993, it was designed by Michel Pinseau under the guidance of King Hassan II and built by Moroccan artisans from all over the kingdom. The minaret is 60 stories high topped by a laser, the light from which is directed towards Mecca.The mosque stands on a promontory looking out to the Atlantic Ocean; worshippers can pray over the sea but there is no glass floor looking into the sea. The walls are of hand-crafted marble and the roof is retractable. A maximum of 105,000 worshippers can gather together for prayer: 25,000 inside the mosque hall and another 80,000 on the mosque\'s outside ground.
You may have to restart the game for changes to come into effect.\n\nDo you want to restart the game now?
Makes tunnels diamond free, lets tollbooths generate more income and makes roads cheaper overall in this city.
Lets tollbooths generate more income and makes roads cheaper overall in this city.
Local cities will still be stored locally, only
A new statue to celebrate our 20k members Discord anniversary. For this anniversary we held up a scavenger hunt which was completed first by our glorious member KolaKattz
A simple pavement to connect close buildings for pedestrians.
An oversized open box from which horses, cows, and other animals feed.
Option to reset cities in newly generated regions
Happiness about waste collection and disposal.
The spruce is a coniferous evergreen tree. It can be found in the northern temperate and boreal regions of the Earth. It can grow up to 60 meters.
A tree that can grow up to 30 meters and looks quite common.
Here, you can import/export energy, water, waste, and deceased bodies between neighboring cities.

Here you can view and adjust your taxes as well as view your monthly expenses. Richer inhabitants and workers pay more taxes. Too high taxes and your inhabitants will be unhappy and leave your city, resulting in low tax happiness. We recommend setting your taxes between 6.5 % and 8.0 %.

Here you can view and adjust your taxes as well as view your monthly expenses. Richer inhabitants and workers pay more taxes. Too high taxes and your inhabitants will be unhappy and leave your city, resulting in low tax happiness. We recommend setting your taxes between 6.5 % and 8.0 %.
Upload screenshots of your cities to the online gallery
You seem to be offline. Please check your internet connection and look out for updates.
The plugin you are about to download did not get many downloads or ratings yet. Therefore, it may not exactly hold up to your expectations.
Here you can see the happiness of your inhabitants. More happiness attract more people to live in your city. Tap on a row to see the corresponding distribution in the city.

The current rank of a city indicates its level of development. You can gain city points to reach the next level by getting more inhabitants or just developing the city in general. Unlocking a rank can unlock new buildings for you.
No money left? You can take a loan to continue building stuff. However, keep in mind that you will have to pay back the loan over time.
Staying healthy in a big city can be an issue. Build medical facilities to keep your inhabitants healthy and happy.
Many buildings need power to function. Ensure that you produce sufficient amounts of energy but also that everything is connected to the grid.
Here you see some general information about your city.
Education is essential for inhabitants to improve their living conditions but also to attract educated workers and investors.
This is essentially your air traffic control tower to control your airports. You can pick lanes from the map, buy airplanes, and assign the airplanes to the lanes.

Water is essential for life and your inhabitants are no exception. Ensure that you provide sufficient amounts of water and that you have everything connected with pipes. Don\'t place water pumps in polluted areas or your inhabitants will get sick.
These graphs can help you to track the development of the city. Use the arrows on the right side to switch between different graphs. The +/- buttons can be used to zoom in and out.
You can place ground easily by using this tool.
Are you sure you want to replace %s with this set? This cannot be undone.
You seem to be logged in using a Facebook account. Unfortunately, this kind of access is deprecated and can no longer be supported.\nPlease login using a forum account to migrate your data.
Permanently unlock the Opera House and the adjacent Opera Park. These cultural buildings enhance the visual character of your city and can serve as a central landmark within urban districts.
A major cultural landmark that represents music and performing arts in your city. The Opera House contributes to the city\'s prestige and provides a distinctive architectural centerpiece.
A decorative park designed to complement the Opera House. It adds green space and visual appeal to the surrounding area, making it well suited for cultural and central districts.

This integration adds better supply systems, few new service cars, a new road which is faster and is cheaper, a new disaster, DSA flags, new buildings, a lot of events, a space dimension to explore, new methods to earn money and much more.
Zone to declare DSA territory in the city.
Faster than normal road designed by DSA.
Insanely speedy road designed by DSA.
The headquarters for all DSA operations in the area.
Establishes DSA department for emergency services which increases public safety by dispatching special teams.
Establishes DSA department of research which overlooks research centers and bases in the area.
Establishes DSA department of resource management which manages resource gathering in the area.
Local DSA office with most qualified representatives.
DSA\'s most powerful ICBM capable of destroy anything that comes into contact with it.
A flare used to mark the target for „X-treme“ ICBM
DSA\'s missile silo prepared to launch „X-treme“ ICBM.
Building responsible for all local DSA space operations.
The home for all DSA\'s advanced technologies approved by the executive council of DSA.
Research new experimental advanced supply systems.
Research for ways to contain organisms and particles.
Research new rocket technology to explore and colonise other space bodies in the universe.
Research mind and physics bending technologies.
A totally inconspicuous place to purchase your clocks.
A decoration for your DSA base.
Now where did this rock come from?
A tribute to the first animal ever launched into Earth orbit.
Used for gathering valuable resources which are sold for a profit, however be aware of it having ability to cause earthquakes.
Upgrade the laser to be stronger and gather resources faster.\n\nOnly one upgrade is allowed at the same time. Old upgrades will be removed.
Introduce a lot of optimisations to increase the power efficiency of the station.\n\nOnly one upgrade is allowed at the same time. Old upgrades will be removed.
Upgrade the station to gather resources without interfering with the enviroment.\n\nOnly one upgrade is allowed at the same time. Old upgrades will be removed.
The CEO of DSA resides here and ensures DSA to do it\'s job.
A mansion of DSA\'s leader himself.
The world class cheese made for CEO of DSA.
Press this to arm this intercontinental ballistic missile.
A harsh place designed to keep in all evil-doers.
Teach prisoners the basics of things lowering the chance of them becoming criminals again.
Rocket is not fully supplied yet
Need: Dyson sphere built in space
Help the giant pickle on the moon
Energy from fusion is proven to be more efficient and cleaner than other energy, but it costs more in return.
Antenna used for transmitting power from Dyson sphere back to Theonia using microwave radio waves.\n\nNote: the outputted power is at very high voltage.
Produces water from synthesis reaction of hydrogen and oxygen.
A missile launch silo for DSA\'s greatest intercontinental ballistic missiles ever created.
A BSL-4 containment facility containing most dangerous substances known to man including the infamous poccolovirus.
Offers noise and pollution protection for your citizens.
Indestructible walls designed to hold destructive substances at bay.
An excellent machine used for cutting trees for thrice the cash.
The boundary at which the gravitational pull of a massive object becomes so great as to make escape impossible.
A region in spacetime in which tidal gravitational forces become infinite.
A virus of unknown origin which exhibits insane destructive properties.
A virus of unknown origin which exhibits insane destructive properties.
A mutated strain of geliumium which targets the regular virus.
Building for gathering and refining local minerals.
A depleted mining station which no longer serves any purpose
Set a living zone for inhabitants of your colony.
A cucumber cake in a pickle jar. Don\'t listen to it if it says something.
The place where DSA launches it\'s rockets from.\nRequires road access to industry for supplies.
Launch an empty experimental rocket to space to gather information and prepare for other launches and operations.\nSupplies: ${_dsareadiness}/1000
Launch a rocket with cat inside named Akial to space to gather vital information.\nSupplies: ${_dsareadiness}/2500
Launch a rocket with a man to space to conduct navigational tests.\nSupplies: ${_dsareadiness}/5000
Launch a rocket containing few sattelites to space to establish a satellite network.\nSupplies: ${_dsareadiness}/7500
Launch a rocket to the exploration mission to find a suitable place for colonisation.\nSupplies: ${_dsareadiness}/10000
Launch series of rockets to space to assemble the space defense initiative.\nSupplies: ${_dsareadiness}/15000
A limited edition cake made specifically for Lobby from the community!\nHappy Birthday to Lobby!
Hello there! I am the CEO of DSA and I will help you to manage all local DSA operations.
It appears as if the land started shaking!
Mayor, due to threat of an earthquake we are withdrawing disaster recovery funds.
Hey mayor, you can build some drills in your city to extract and sell minerals, but they have a small chance of causing an earthquake.
Mayor, our systems detected an unknown substance which is destroying everything in it\'s path.
Everyone, prepare for a lift off!
Hello mayor. I\'ve started building my little house here as you have allowed me to do so.
This is getting out of hand...Time for protocol „Explosive Stop“.
Quantum cores are explosive. Didn\'t you know?
Oh hello there, Mr. Hacker, you wouldn\'t mind a black hole, would ya?
Mayor, should we invest some money for disaster recovery in case everything goes wrong?
The rocket has reached the destination.\nWould you like to view it?
Morning mayor, can I build a house somewhere in your city where I would reside?
Initiating landing procedures, hang on tight!
You can exploit visible ore deposits with drilling stations for some income!
It seems like colonists are starving. Provide them with enough food!
Oof, sorry for the rough landing. We had to adapt some tech to work on here.
As you also probably saw, I\'ve transfered 10 million theons to build a small outpost.
Please spend the funds wisely as it\'s your only shot at this.
As for further funding, you may attempt exploiting those ore deposits.
Anyways, good luck, mayor! Remember, you can always return here by finding the map in your single cities list.
A big Happy Birthday from me and the community! I hope you have a wonderful day!
During this space exploration trip, we detected a big enough body to land on.\nConnecting you to the space command...
This space exploration trip returns nothing of interest.
Ah, yeah, oof, the rocket is on collision course with earth...HAVE FUN!
Congratulations mayor, we have established SDI network above this area. It will protect the city from meteorites and UFO invasions.
Congratulations! We\'ve constructed the greatest our achievement - the Dyson sphere!
That wasn\'t very cash money of you.
A strange structure with unknown use.
Might have some precious metals inside.
A vehicle used for landing on other space bodies.
Appears to be the overlord of pickles found in this region.
Seems like a form of an intelligent life.
Use or purpose of this object is unsure.
Building commanding all local and space operations in the vacinity.
Building which is used for easy transportation of goods, materials or people in space.
A place for colonists to remain fit and healthy.
Building for colonist faith and religion.
A station where garbage is recycled back into usable objects or materials.
Pipes used to transfer water to your local base.
Make water out of bodily fluids of colonists or synthesis.
Convert solar energy to power to light up your base.
Wires used to transfer electricity underground to your base.
Reinforced ground tracks for rovers and other vehicles.
A building with artificial ecosystem designed for food production.
Building where food and other critical supplies are stored.\nContents:\nFood: ${food_storage/10}/${total_food_storage/10}
Export helium 3 back to Theonia for use in fusion reactors. You\'d export enough Helium 3 for up to ${helium_amount} power plants.
Construct a megastructure around a star which would capture a large percentage of star\'s power output.\nMicrowave antenna will be required to receive power.
Need: Help Pickles on the Moon
Building for gathering and refining Helium 3.
Building for gathering and refining Genericum.
Building for gathering and refining Poccolonum.
Remote used for controlling the Pidroid.
Build a remote to control the Pidroid.
One of the most intelligent and advanced robots ever made which runs on nuclear power.\n\nNOTE: due to safety concerns, the AI has been removed from this model.
You\'re never too old for a pickle
Not knowing what I could do
I see you\'ve ran out of money! I\'m sending the last remaining allocated funds for this project. Spend them wisely!
Investigate the artifact and send the collected data back to HQ for a monetary reward.
Some fake trees to keep the colonists happy.
A huge rocket specifically designed to fit a lot pickles inside it.
Unfortunately, moon regions are not yet supported. The city will now close!
I\'m sorry, I am unable to tell you anything of interest!
I\'m sorry, but I have nothing for you at this time.
Please do not be afraid! We came here with peace.
Well, crash landed would be more fitting.
We trust you won\'t hurt us. Do we trust you right?
Very well. You may do whatever you want to us, however we won\'t tell you anything.
That\'s great. Allow me to introduce myself.
I am GenericGiantPickleLeader#01 - leader of the Cucumber galaxy.
All we need is a little help. In return you may have all our knowledge.
I\'ll tell you the exact details later, I need to rest now.
You came back? Good, we thought you ran away!
We want to see if you have the willpower and what it takes for the task.
Destroy all the mining stations which are destroying this fine place!
I can still see some mining stations running, come back again when they are all offline.
I understand that you rely on those ores for resources...
But have you ever thought of investing in those strange structures, instead?
How about you give that a try, eh?
Come on, give researching artifacts a try!
We\'ve come to realisation that I need some things...
Namely, Poccolonum, a very nice resources that we will use later.
Just build a mining station on top of some of the green ore.
We\'ll take the ore for our project ourselves.
Don\'t be shy now, build a Poccolonum mine!
I am once again asking for your financial support
I need all of that thing you call theons.
Can you give me all your theons?
Too bad, hope you can change your mind later.
Trust me, I\'ll put it to good use.
I have one last favour, mayor
I assume you are familiar with rocket construction
Could you construct a rocket according to these schematics?
Being the generous pickle that I am, I\'ve gotten all resources for it
I see the rocket construction is still underway
I\'m afraid this is the last time we\'re seeing each other.
We are now ready to return to our home galaxy and rebuild it, provided that there\'s something left.
We will now hustle our way to the rocket.
Guess this is it. Thank you very much for helping us.
In return, we would like to give you this storage medium.
It contains all of our recorded knowledge.
Once you\'re ready, initiate the launch.
Oh, you don\'t have any available? Let me do a magic trick...
Here you can setup the amount to charge.
All of your previous purchases have been restored. You may have to restart the game in order to see an effect.
Perfect surface for cars and other vehicles alike.
Sun-dried wild grass. Perfect for vast plains or grasslands.
Shady grass from the deep woods.
Coarse sand mixed with small rocks.
Moist, lush grass. Perfect for wild forests.
We were told IT lives here.
A deciduous tree species commonly used for ornamental purposes.
Tall, orange-leaved trees that mostly thrive in colder climates.
Decorative evergreen conifers that are often used as Christmas trees.
Mixed small bush species. Great for parks and forests alike.
The path forward will not reveal itself to the weak. Venture forth with strength.
You will see, we have plenty of contents. Take your time to explore them all. After that, you may be ready to visit our plugin store to unlock thousands of additional contents.

Ready to dive into the fun? Unlock this awesome zone now and start your very own city adventure without the wait for those population requirements.\n\nNo more waiting – let\'s build some epic cities together!
Compacted dirt road. Cheap, but slow to move on. Great for rural areas.
Look out! A wooden lookout tower that can for example be used to watch out for fires.
Huge rock formation of assorted shapes.
Navigate with style using Highway Signs for your city roads.
Connect highways with slower roads or create elaborate interections with this one-way road.
Tall fence made of metal mesh.
A short, black railing to protect pedestrians.
Keep yourself safe with these metallic traffic barriers.

The following plugins do not define a plugin manifest file (plugin.manifest). This can cause issues with other plugins and online mode. Future compatibility cannot be guaranteed:
People in this building are ill. You should send a medic.
This building is not connected to a suitable road.
This building does not receive enough energy.
This building does not receive enough water.
This building is overloaded. Provide more capacities.
People in this building are unhappy.
There is non collected garbage in this building.
There are uncollected corpses in this building.
Someone put illegal graffiti on here.

Scripts are pieces of code that define behaviors and functionalities in plugins. They can control game mechanics, add new features, or automate actions within the game. However, scripts may also cause bugs or even crash the game.
 
 Scripts are restricted from accessing your personal files, modifying system settings or running code outside the game.
 
 YOU have the power to approve script execution for external plugins. Only whitelist scripts from sources you trust (e.g. yourself, if you are working on a plugin).
 
 If in doubt, DO NOT enable script execution without inspecting the code yourself.
 
 Plugins that require script execution to work may not function as expected if disabled. You have to restart the game for changes to have an effect.
Culture is provided by some landmarks, awards and plugins!

Most smaller landmarks up to the Eiffel tower produce a culture influence as well as awards with cultural significance in the real world. More plugins which provide culture can be downloaded through the plugin store and forum.
If buildings catch fire too often, place a fire station close by!

If buildings catch fire too often, it is a good indicator that your fire station influence range does not cover it. Residential, Commercial and Industrial buildings require a fire station so take care to cover the whole map with fire station influences. This will help avoid fire incidences in the future.
Keep residentials far away from pollution

Residents do not like pollution. If they are complaining about too much pollution, investigate the source of it. The building producing the influence can be spotted by pressing on the eye tool and then the pollution or by looking for buildings with red circles around them. Move the pollution causing building or demolish it in favor of a more environmentally friendly option.
You can reduce pollution by surrounding it with trees

Residential buildings do not like pollution. To save the hassle of moving buildings, especially in well-planned cities, you can use trees. Trees deter pollution. Placing more trees will reduce the pollution more. It is often also the more cost effective method as trees are pretty cheap. The number of trees to be placed depends on the amount of pollution and the influence strength from the trees.
Use one way roads and intersections to reduce traffic

Often, places like highways and industrial areas can get congested with traffic. A proper road network is needed to fix it. One way roads and intersections can help with this. There are prebuilt intersections in both the game and as plugins. You can also make your own by using real life interchanges as an example. This would allow for a better flow of traffic, reducing it in your city.
You can adjust traffic volume in settings to reduce traffic

To adjust traffic volume in settings, turn on debug mode first, it should be also there. Once debug is turned on, the option of lowering or increasing the traffic is offered to you. Which percentage you choose depends on how much traffic you have and how much of a challenge is wanted.
To get more cash, take a loan

Press the income icon and then switch to the tab with the green cash icon. Then press "raise". The amount of money offered on the loan depends on the balance and up to 5 loans can be taken out at a time.
Loans get repaid automatically each month

Loan payments are automatically deducted from your month automatically by the game each month. They do not have to be paid manually, although you could reduce the monthly expenses by doing so. The payback period can be viewed by going into the loans tab.
The official discord server is a place where players and creators hang out, show off their creations and make friends. The link can be found in-game within the settings.
You can make your own plugins. It\'s easy™

It might seem a bit intimidating at first but making plugins is easy. To make textures, you can use something like paint.net on PC and Pixly on mobile. To do the json or "code", you can write your own with the help of the forums or use https://pca.svetikas.lt/. If you have any questions, we can answer them on discord or the forums!
Collaborate on a region using online mode

By pressing the online button in region view, you can collaborate with friends or other members to create a beautiful region. The game does not allow more than one player to work on the same map but you can visit other cities and get inspired.
Uploading a map to online mode takes diamonds or region coins

Diamonds (mobile) and region coins (PC) are awarded for logging in daily. The cost of uploading a region varies depending on the size. While uploading a map, the creator can choose to set a password and some rules. Once created, password cannot be added or removed.
You can get diamonds by logging in daily

Logging in everyday (mobile) is rewarded by diamonds. By logging in every day over the week, you get more rewards. Once you get the final reward, it resets and it starts again. You can additionally watch videos for diamonds every 30 minutes - but remember to turn off any ad block so that they will show!
Rocket supplies are provided by certain industrial buildings

The buildings that supply oil are spread across the different levels of industries. These include oil extraction buildings, storage buildings and processing buildings. These will provide your rocket with supplies. Having more buildings close to the rocket will help to supply it faster.
There may be no visible train nor bus usage, but they still have an effect

Buses and Trains may show that there are no passengers for now. However, they already have an effect and the usage data may be updated in the future. Buses and trains do provide transport happiness. So be sure to cover the RCI areas with them.
The spray paint icon indicates vandalism, build a police station

The spray paint icon appears when the buildings are not provided with police influence. Residential, commercial and industrial buildings require police influence so make sure to provide these buildings with it to avoid future crimes.
Build cemeteries and crematoriums to treat dead people

If a dead person icon pops up above one or more buildings, it indicates that you need to build cemeteries or crematoriums. Cemeteries are good when starting out, but as the city grows, they will have to be cleared out more and more often. So a crematorium may be a better long term solution.
To make some extra income, set up neighborhood commercial

This can only be done in regions where you have nearby cities unlocked. There is a neighborhood commercial tab. By adjusting the values, you can import or export from nearby cities. This does not work in online mode nor if one or more of the cities you are trying to set up is in sandbox or uber mode.
The airport is a good long term investment

To make an airport functional, build all the airport buildings, add lanes, and assign airplanes to the lanes. The airport often becomes profitable when being used. This means once the initial cost is covered, a good deal of profit can be made.

There are a couple of experienced TheoTown players and creators who publish videos on YouTube. These range from inspirational gameplay time-lapse videos to videos that can aid you in enhancing your gameplay experience.
Prices increase in game just like in real life
Placing more buildings and roads increases their price. The more it is used, the higher the price will become. This stays true for roads, decorations, zones and all types of buildings.
For more creative freedom, play on sandbox/uber mode

A lot of experienced players prefer to play on sandbox or uber mode to express more of their creative freedom. This allows them to build without the limitation of funds and in the case of uber mode, without having to worry about happiness or needs. Often buildings are placed manually to create amazing works. Do not fret if this does not sound like you, everyone builds differently!
You can turn off auto disasters in the game settings

Disasters can be turned off in the settings and you can choose what disasters, if any, you want to play with. If the mining stations from the DSA or military missile silos are being used, the city may still be at risk of earthquakes or other disasters.
Most your income is from taxes, but don\'t set it above 9%

Especially early game, 90% or more of the income is being made from taxing the residents. A good amount of tax to collect is between 7% and 9%. If the taxation is higher than that, there is risk of riots and people abandoning the houses and the city.
You can toggle taxes using the + and - buttons

Press the smiley icon and then navigate to the taxes tab, then use the + and - button to toggle the taxation for each building type and income group. Be careful not to set the taxation too high though.
Use DSA to go to the moon

Unlock DSA and upgrade the buildings to go to the moon. The rocket will need supplies and once fully supplied, has a chance of going to the moon or crashing. If launch to the moon is successful, the moon map can be located under single cities for revisits. By mining certain ores in space, you can unlock certain buildings for the map which was used to go to the moon.
Careful! The ICBM will blow up your whole city

The ICBM is not a naturally occurring disaster and can only be set off through DSA. Be careful when using the ICBM though, it will blow up the entire city, no matter how big into scraps within seconds. You can backup or duplicate the city to avoid regrets after testing the ICBM on it.
Dense zones accommodate more people, but is more expensive to place

Dense zones are generally more expensive to place than normal zones but can house more people. In turn, they are often taller than normal zones as well. Those differences aside, there is not much else as they have the same needs as normal zones.
You can download plugins through the forums

Some plugin creators choose to exclusively publish some plugins on the forums. This allows you to download plugins the plugin store may not have. These are free to download and have to be placed in the plugins folder of your device manually. Be careful as these plugins aren\'t moderated.
Toll booths give additional income but they make residents unhappy

Toll booths can be placed to charge a fine to vehicles driving on roads which help to collect income. The amount charged can be adjusted by pressing on the toll. This does however reduce transport happiness and makes people unhappy.
Not all buildings have rotation frames

Some vanilla buildings do have rotation frames but not all. Especially when it comes to plugins, there may not be rotation frames. This is because the author did not make them. To see which buildings have rotation frames, press on a building and see if they have next and previous buttons on the top right corner. Not having rotation frames leaves more space for more varied buildings.
Change the map orientation using the mini map

The mini map can be used as a tool to rotate the map. Press the mini map and use the arrows to rotate the map left or right. It is important to note that while the map rotates, not all buildings will rotate if rotation frames were not provided.
Build zones which are above the demand line

When the demand is above the demand line, it indicates that people or businesses of the respective demand want to move to your city. So you should provide them with the facilities to do so. When the demand is below the demand line, it indicates to build other zones and support facilities such as parks and police.
Press on a building to see their lowest happiness

Pressing on a building helps to identify why the house and the houses close by are unhappy. It also gives an average happiness for the house. Once the reason for lowest happiness is identified you can act to fix it. For example if a building is unhappy because of lack of parks you should place one close to the building to increase the happiness.
There are official game extensions on the plugin store
Official game extensions are published on the plugin store by the user Lobby. These are usually free as they are official game extensions.
Don\'t compare with other players\' cities, take inspiration

Different players have different styles. Instead of getting jealous of other players\' cities, try pinpointing exactly what draws you to it. Why do you like it so much exactly? Once you figure that out, try implementing it in your cities little by little and watch the city grow.
Use auto connect roads when building road networks

Press the road of choice and then press "join road" in the upper right corner to automatically join the road that is being built. This will help to avoid roads not working due to not being properly connected.

If there is a green face above the buildings, it indicates the residentials are sick. To avoid this in the future, build hospitals in range of all the zones. To keep your residents healthy you should also ensure that your water supplies are located in clean areas.
Residentials need both high and low education
To improve educational happiness, both high and low education have to be provided. These are needed for the buildings to become richer. So be sure to cover the residential areas with both influences.
To reduce lag, disable smooth zoom
If you feel the game is laggy, consider turning off smooth zoom options. This option can be found within the game settings. This can help to improve the gameplay experience.
Elevate roads using the arrow options on the right

Press the road to be built. Then while in the build menu, press a tile and then build up to build an upward slope. Press an elevated road and build down to build a downward slope. At the same time, press bridge to automatically build a bridge. However, not all roads support building elevated roads.
Download / activate all missing plugins at once

Note that regions that remain inactive for over a year may be subject to automatic deletion. This measure is necessary to free up space for new regions and ensure an optimal experience for active players. Prior to any deletion due to inactivity, we will notify you in advance.
To ensure the integrity of our reporting system, only logged-in users can submit reports. Please log in to continue with your report.
This scenario requires version %s or higher, but you are using %s.\n\nPlease check for updates to play this scenario.
Click and drag on the garbage to clear it.
Click and drag to free up some space.
Place the road along the marked tiles. To build it click to set a start point, click again to set the end point.
Click on this button to see detailed demand information for every zone type.
Click at the bottom right corner to get more information about your money or to change taxes.
Click on the start and the end point of the planned road. See how a bridge will be built automatically over the river.
Just a present. Try clicking on it.
Want to build a specific road or building again? Use this tool and click on it. Not supported by all structures.
Do you want to upload your screenshot to our gallery?\n\nBy clicking on \"Upload now\", you agree that you accept our policy.
This landfill is full! Click on it to clear it!
Left click on it to open and close it. A great way to create traffic jams.
Create a game of life field. Click on existing tiles to switch their state. Default state is dead.
A specialized facility designed to keep roads clear during winter. Deploys plows that swiftly remove ice and snow, ensuring uninterrupted traffic flow.

Scenarios in TheoTown are pre-made maps with special conditions. You build your city under certain restrictions, such as limited funds or specific plugin rules. When the scenario ends, you can upload your city to compete with others in a friendly contest.
Are you sure that you want to reset your progress? You can either move it to your individual cities to continue playing or delete it completely.
There are no scenarios available right now.

This unlinks your forum account from your Steam account. This may have side effects and should only be done if necessary. The game will restart after unlinking.
